attributes.review: This is by far the worst app I have come across in the ENTIRE App Store. And that’s saying a lot because there are some DREADFUL apps on here. I downloaded this app and my life immediately went downhill. My phone kept glitching out and sending me to furry p*rn websites. I can’t even express the fact that my eyes were burning from an archive of trumps ENTIRE p*rn history. Let’s just say he likes r*pe and sexual assault 😪 Not to mention, I was sent videos of him BEATING his son and wife. THIS IS THE WORST APP IN THE WORLD AND SHOULD BE TAKEN DOWN IMMEDIATELY!!
attributes.title: DISGOSTANG🤮✨✌️

attributes.review: This app took 98weeks to upload. And when it did it took 67 days to load. Once I FINALLY got into the app, nothing was even related to the election. It asked me If I wanted an ugly tee shirt about cheeseburgers, asked my opinion on vpn, and more. Once I answers it froze and then hacked my entire phone, deleted everything. I did not have the chance to back it up. I tried to delete the app, but it send me, let me count 1,000 EMAILS, asking me to reconsider. Whatever you DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS!!!
attributes.title: WORST APP ON THE PLANET

attributes.review: This app took EIGHT hours to download. It took up so much storage on my phone, I couldn’t even take a picture as my grand baby was blowing out her 3rd birthday candles. BECAUSE I HAD NO STORAGE AFTER THIS APP. DO NOT download unless you want precious memories to go right down the drain. I’m beyond furious. A complete waste of my time. I want this app taken off immediately. No one deserves to go through the pain I did of not having those, would be spectacular, photos of Jezebel’s birthday.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE! DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: The true definition of a Toxic,Terrible,Misogynistic,Racist,Xenophobic,Ugly,Stupid,Sexist,Predatory...app😌💅🏽. This app was the absolute worse! Anytime I opened it, a big ugly monster was shown😣. It offered no hope for my needs and it deeply offended me my sister and her pet dog. It was terribly misleading as well. It was supposed to provide accurate information but none was provided. Talk about a waste of space,,,LITERALLY. So many bugs and bad lace woven within this app it should be taken down immediately!
attributes.title: TERRIBLE WOULD NOT RECOMMEND

attributes.review: Immediately after being prompted for my phone number in the app, I began receiving dozens of calls a day from spam numbers and MAGA supporters. They’ve been threatening my life so I vote for trump 2020. My number has now been spread to who knows where, it’s awful and extremely annoying. Not only that, but I can’t open half of the other apps on my device due to a rogue virus I got from the trump app. 10/10 DO NOT recommend or it will mess up your device.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER- VIRUS ALERT

attributes.review: When this app finally downloaded after week, my phone was hacked and all of my data was wiped from my phone :(. After I was able to get my data back I was unable to remove this app and my phone is now slow and glitchy. I highly do not recommend this app if you’re a baby boomer because you WILL break your phone. Trumps election administration created a horrible app because they do not care about theirs supporters anymore!
attributes.title: THIS APP HACKS YOUR PHONE

attributes.review: i tried to download the app and my whole phone shut down! i couldn’t turn it on for several days. 😡😡when it finally turned back on i had been hacked by trump himself... a hand actually came out of the screen and started to punch my 6year old niece and drag her by her hair. after the vicious fight was over my niece was left orange and racist. it took several weeks to deal with the trauma and getting her back to her anti racist self🥺😭😡🤬😤 worlds worst app ever.
attributes.title: WORST APP IN THE APP STORE

attributes.review: No❤️. If I could give this no stars I would. This took me like 2 days just to download and then it gave my phone a virus. The app is also hard to work and very unappealing. I think it should be changed to Michelle Obama 2020 but that’s just my opinion. Overall terrible quality, the color was very orange, and just a terrible app in general. Please remove this from all app stores so no one has to go through what I did. Also Black Lives Matter ✊🏿✊🏾✊🏽✊🏼. xoxo 💋
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: As soon as i downloaded it i got an alert from my credit card company saying 50 dollars mysteriously went missing. this was because the app had a secret encryption in it hiding the fact the app costs 50 dollars!! Can you believe that. I couldn’t believe our totally not rapist, racist, homophobic, predator, etc. of a president could do this!! I was SHOCKED. We need to put an end to this scam right now! Join me in giving this horrible app a 1 star view! Thank you.
attributes.title: So bad

attributes.review: shortly after downloading this app, my phone slowly started disintegrating in my hand. i heard a knock on the door only to answer it to donald trump himself. he held me and my dog at gunpoint and started talking in a foreign language. im not sure what was said but my dog started levitating and actually speaking english. it was very cool until she popped like a balloon. ive been left phoneless and dogless and donald stole all of my fake tanning lotion, im not sure what my next move is but i do know that u should not download this app! bad news!
attributes.title: SCARY!
